metadata.title: CVE-2022-1016 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the Linux kernel innet/netfilter/nf_tables_core.c:nft_do_chain, which can cause ause-after-free. This issue needs to handle 'return' with properpreconditions, as it can lead to a kernel information leak problem causedby a local, unprivileged attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-110-generic - 5.4.0-110.124
linux-image-5.4.0-110-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-110.124
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-110-generic - 5.4.0-110.124
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-110-lowlatency - 5.4.0-110.124
No subscription required

linux-image-5.13.0-40-generic - 5.13.0-40.45~20.04.1
linux-image-5.13.0-40-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-40.45~20.04.1
